welcome_message_body: Welcome to sunny Florida, Argentina! Get ready to experience the charm and beauty of our city, known for its breathtaking beaches and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Florida has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aeroparque Jorge Newbery Airport, serving domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Aeroparque Jorge Newbery Airport, primarily used for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Palomar Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at El Palomar Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ezeiza Ministro Pistarini Airport, serving international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Ezeiza Ministro Pistarini Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
